description:
Train hard at home, so you can climb hard at the crag. The Beastmaker 1000 board is a great choice for climbers who are new to hangboarding, as it has an abundance of deep holds, and even jugs, to strengthen your fingers. The wooden construction is gentle on skin, so you can focus on your hangs instead of worrying about thin fingertips.

  • Made of fine-textured wood
  • 2 full-hand jugs, 2 sets of flat slopers, 3 sets of 3-finger pockets, 2 sets of 2-finger pockets, lots of edges
  • Comes with mounting hardware
name: Beastmaker Beastmaker 1000 Hangboard
